name: The Trap Of The lost City
name_original: The Trap Of The lost City
description:
It s a project for the  LOWREZJAM 2019 ;)

The goal is to create a game 64 pixels by 64 pixels ( The game can be played in full screen) and I chose as the main theme:  "Growing pains"

437/5000

This is an adventure game in tribute to Indiana Jones movies.

In search of a legendary treasure, you must escape without dying. And there is plenty of way to die;)

Each run lasts 15 minutes max. So you can explore the corners of the map to find as much treasure as you can.
But watch out for traps, toxic plants and piranhas.

The game can be played on the keyboard and the joystick (X box)

The story:

"

Finally after a long journey,

I finally reached the lost city of Delina.

In a deep Valley nestled in a Ancient Volcano, the ruins were everywhere.

And now, in front of me, the heart of the great Temple, the Manalivah.

A Heart of Red stone, treasure of the High Chaman.

I have to protect the relics! And take them to the Museum

I reach my hand …

Oh no it was a TRAP !

The heart kept the Volcano Dormant

I have 15 min to rech the exit with the most treasures

"

Have a good Game ;)
